entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
